body.p: Are you interested in the new book Ada & Zangemann: A tale of software, skateboards, and raspberry ice cream? The book is a modern fairy tale that conveys the joy of tinkering and calls for self-determined use of software: for children from 6 years of age. A charming story that adults can also enjoy.

Join the author reading of the book on Friday 25 February 2022 at 21:00. Meet the author of the book, Matthias Kirchner, and ask any questions you might have. The reading will be in German. The event is part of the yearly Winter Congress event by Digital Society.
